name: The Frog On The Log
description:
The Frog On The Log is a 3rd person action game in which you take control of a frog dedicated to take back his log that he was kicked off of. Jump and eat your way through various waves of insects in this short and fun 3d action platformer.

Features:

  • 18 Levels spread across 3 worlds
  • Battle several different types of insects on your way to the log
  • 7 unique musical tracks
  • Vibrant and colorful ponds
  • 2-3 Hours of gameplay
